Chair @RepMaloney is using every tool at her disposal to hold them accountable. Millions of new jobs, lower costs for consumers, and broad-based economic growth! Bobby L. Rush (Democrat-IL) said: Investing in #cleanenergy instead of fossil fuels can protect us from future economic shocks, create jobs, and help establish the U.S. as a leading voice in the fight against #climatechange.
